entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning then changing to rain mixed with light snow this afternoon and ending later this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 60 late this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 21 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Wednesday 26 April 2023
